translations: 建筑术的；组织的；知识体系的
体系论；建筑学（等于 architectonics）

sentences.sentence: We should thank thousands of architectonic workers.
sentences.translation: 我们应该感谢成千上万的建筑工人。

sentences.sentence: This architectonic marvel has become the symbol of the city.
sentences.translation: 这一建筑上的奇迹已经成为奥斯陆的象征。

sentences.sentence: Referring to it, the catalogue speaks of “one of the most elemental architectonic forms”.
sentences.translation: 作品样本在提到这件作品时称："具有最粗犷的构造形态"。
